name: HamsterLoop
description:
- - - Project created for Ludum Dare 47 - Theme :  Stuck in a Loop  - - -
Vote Hamster Loop at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/hamsterloop

Help the little Hamster to pass all the 30 rooms. 

His wheel always moves ..You can change direction or jump..
In each room you have to find the way to pass through all the traps.

Eat the nuts to get more points and also you can find lives around.

There are also the checkpoint that let you start in different rooms after you reach them.

Developer and Graphics : Mauro Rilla

Music and sound : Ramsey Johnson  -  https://soundcloud.com/ramsey-johnson 

Application developed with :

  • Unity 2019=> Game Engine
  • Krita=> Graphics
  • MR TIles Master => Tiles generated
  • Future earth V2 => Free font

Enjoy all the 30 rooms available
